channel.title: Best PC Games of 2010
channel.description: Okay, i started this thread to post what you thought was the best PC game(s) of 2010. Im just going to throw this out there right away, I thought StarCraft II was, but i want to hear your opinions.

item.title: Best PC Games of 2010
item.dc:creator: pfannkuchen_gesicht
item.description:
I would say Metro 2033 was a pretty good game in this year

Read full topic

item.title: Best PC Games of 2010
item.dc:creator: DinoThrasher
item.description:
No, I’m pretty sure the coming 2 expansions (Zerg and Protoss) will be continuations of the Starcraft II story, in the same way that Starcraft I had 3 campaigns (Zerg, Protoss, and Terran) that followed each other chronologically but showed each piece of the story from a different viewpoint.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: Secomed
item.description:
sudpuzzer:

How does the ending even hint at a Starcraft III? Heart of the Swarm is gonna pick up right after where Wings of Liberty left off…

I was under the impression that it would be the same campaign, but you play as Kerrigan instead of Raynor

item.title: Best PC Games of 2010
item.dc:creator: BahamutBBob
item.description:
Secomed:

I personally cant wait for the StarCraft II expansions, but what i cant wait for even more is StarCraft III (yes there is going to be a StarCraft III, if you beat the game you’ll find out why)

Wings of Liberty was only 1/3 of the story. They are releasing the game in three parts for three reasons.

They came up with enough story for each race’s campaign to make a full length game.
They didn’t want to make people wait however long to start the story.
Bobby Kotick wants more money.

There may be a Starcraft III, but they probably aren’t planning on it. Blizzard usually doesn’t plan that far ahead. See: Starcraft. It’s sequel didn’t come out for over 10 years. Same with Diablo II.

I didn’t play a lot of 2010 releases, but out of the ones that I did play that I enjoyed, Mass Effect 2 is awesome and on PC.

Read full topic

item.title: Best PC Games of 2010
item.dc:creator: Maxey
item.description:
These simple three words will make any VVVVVV player rage beyond belief.

“Veni, Vidi, Vici”

item.title: Best PC Games of 2010
item.dc:creator: gibbelin
item.description:
Maxey:

The game is good for its unique gameplay mechanics, level design, music and super hard difficulty.

I’ll back this. Although the game was actually too hard for my tastes. Like, fucking Battletoads/Contra hard. But it was definitely worth the $5 or whatever I paid for it.

item.title: Best PC Games of 2010
item.dc:creator: gibbelin
item.description:
I wasn’t too impressed with 2010. What I played of Red Dead Redemption was great, same goes for the Goldeneye Remake, but as for games I actually bought…

Super Meat Boy
Amnesia
Singularity

A controversial list, I know, but what the hell. Those are the games that really stuck with me this year.

Read full topic

item.title: Best PC Games of 2010
item.dc:creator: DinoThrasher
item.description:
Someonerandm:

What was special about VVVVVV?

It was something different and enjoyable.

I said “Because it deserves more attention.” Everyone is going to say something like Civ 5 or Mass Effect 2, so going with something just as much fun but more obscure and less predictable.

Read full topic

item.title: Best PC Games of 2010
item.dc:creator: mental2k
item.description:
Well afaik the only game I both bought and came out this year was reach. Wasn’t bad actually, a little short and the final “boss” was crap, but aside from that a solid shooter.

Read full topic

item.title: Best PC Games of 2010
item.dc:creator: Wombat
item.description:
QWOP was made 2008 though

Kairouseki:

I saw nothing bad with the graphics. And just because you didn’t like the gameplay or plot doesn’t mean it’s bad. I agree with you on the ending, though.

I didn’t say they were bad, the game is extremely well made for a small indie production. It just still doesn’t make it the best game of the year IMO, because no matter how good job they did, they still just can’t compete with the “real” game companies with hundreds of developers such as Bioware.

Read full topic

item.title: Best PC Games of 2010
item.dc:creator: gibbelin
item.description:
Plus, Halo 2 was a godawful port job (literally one of the worst I’ve seen) that they used to try to launch the equally godawful Games For Windows live, so it sold terribly. If Microsoft hadn’t screwed the pooch, it might have sold well and the newer Halo games might have come to Windows.
